articles.author: Esther Webber, Stuart Lau
articles.title: Shock and recriminations as Chinese spy scandal rocks UK parliament - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Rishi Sunak under pressure to toughen stance on Beijing.
articles.content:
LONDON Rishi Sunak has spent most of his brief premiership treading a delicate balance on relations with China. 
So the last thing the British prime minister needed as he enters a careful autumn of … [+4666 chars]
